actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to provide for the duty-free entry of dogs and cats, regardless of the purposes for which the animals are imported.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to repeal the customs duties on the importation of cats and dogs for any purpose.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to provide for the duty-free entry of dogs and cats, regardless of the purposes for which the animals are imported.
